title: Looking for duo to rank up with.Bronze 1
body:
Been getting so many trolls and just bad players overall really.

i can play anyrole with good knowledge of each champ. 
you cant carry a bad team.

if your interested pls add me in game 

Nguoilon

thankyou

replies.body: I am high silver if you like to add me, but I'd prefer that you stuck to one-two roles rather than portraying a wide variety as one you won't be a master of any role and two it is easier to focus your attention to one area rather than five... I main Top/JG so I am willing to duo but you can't win every game... I don't thnk a single player exists that has won every game they ever played as there is just too many factors to stop that lol

> you cant carry a bad team.


Hi you can carry a bad team, it's hard but you can. Look for the decent player on your team and make it work. I've carried or helped carry many games that have felt like a 2v5
